wf_workflow_version.name: Return Request
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

sys_variable_value.value: // Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

Dear Customer,
Thank you for reaching out to us regarding your return request for order Order_Id: ${order_id}. After careful review by our Customer Support team, we regret to inform you that your return request has been rejected.
Request Rejection Reason: ${request_rejection_reason}
We understand that this news may be disappointing, and we sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. If you have any questions or concerns about the rejection, please feel free to contact our Customer Support team at [Customer Support Email/Phone].

Dear Customer,
Thank you for reaching out to us regarding your return request for order Order_Id: ${order_id}. After careful review by our Customer Support team, we regret to inform you that your return request has been rejected.
Request Rejection Reason: ${request_rejection_reason}
We understand that this news may be disappointing, and we sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. If you have any questions or concerns about the rejection, please feel free to contact our Customer Support team at [Customer Support Email/Phone].
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.
// Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;
// Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;

Dear ${assigned_to},
We would like to inform you that we have received your return request for order # Order_Id: ${order_id}. We appreciate your prompt action in initiating the return process.
Our team is currently reviewing your request, and we will notify you once it has been approved. In the meantime, please ensure that the item(s) you wish to return are in their original condition and packaging.
Thank you for choosing APniDukan. We appreciate your business and strive to provide excellent customer service.
Best regards, ApniDukan Team
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

Dear ${assigned_to},
We would like to inform you that we have received your return request for order # Order_Id: ${order_id}. We appreciate your prompt action in initiating the return process.
Our team is currently reviewing your request, and we will notify you once it has been approved. In the meantime, please ensure that the item(s) you wish to return are in their original condition and packaging.
Thank you for choosing APniDukan. We appreciate your business and strive to provide excellent customer service.

// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

Dear Customer,
We trust this message finds you well. We're pleased to inform you that your return request for order # Order_Id: ${order_id} has been successfully approved by our Customer Support team.
Approved Return Details:
Item(s) to be Returned: Product Name: ${product_name} Return Authorization Number: Return_Id: ${return_id}
Thank you for choosing ApniDukan. We value your satisfaction and look forward to resolving this matter to your complete satisfaction.
Best regards, Team ApniDukan
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.
// Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;
// Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;
Hello Sneha, your return request has been approved successfully.
Hello Sneha, your return request has been approved successfully.
